compliant.section: 二、個資蒐集、處理及利用
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing, Transparency and information, Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject
Information to be provided where personal data have not been obtained from the data subject, Right to object

compliant.section: 五、個資留存及安全維護
compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data (specifically, integrity and confidentiality), Security of processing
Principles relating to processing of personal data (specifically, lawfulness of processing), Conditions for consent

non_compliant.section: 一、個資蒐集、處理及利用之目的
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data (specifically, purpose limitation)
non_compliant.amend: Clearly specify the purpose for each category of personal data collected and processed. Ensure that the purpose is specific, explicit, and legitimate.
Provide a mechanism for data subjects to request rectification of inaccurate personal data.

Clearly outline all data subject rights under GDPR, including the right to access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, data portability, and objection. Provide accessible mechanisms for data subjects to exercise these rights.
This section is too broad. Specify any other relevant GDPR provisions that are addressed in this section, or remove it if not applicable.
